title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not change immediately. The steps to reproduce this issue are as follows:

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label and set its font size to a specific value.
2. Modify the font size of the label to a different value.

Expected behavior (EB):
The label's height should automatically adjust to match the new font size.

Steps to reproduce (SR):
1. Add a label to the application.
2. Modify the label's font size to any value, for example, '18 points'.
3. Observe that the label's height remains the same, regardless of the font size modification.
